remarks: A filter finer than an image filter is an image filter of the same function.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fmfnfm.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( fBas ` Y ) ) $.
fmfnfm.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( Fil ` X ) ) $.
fmfnfm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Y --> X ) $.
fmfnfm.fm $e |- ( ph -> ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) C_ L ) $.
fmfnfm $p |- ( ph -> E. f e. ( Fil ` Y ) ( B C_ f /\ L = ( ( X FilMap F ) ` f ) ) ) $.
$d B f $.
$d F f $.
$d L f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
